posts.post_content:
I'm looking for:
E95   -crease-free or almost crease-free (SGC preferred)
E96   -crease-free or almost crease-free (SGC preferred)
E120  -not picky about condition on these (raw preferred)

I have a wide variety of T206 that I could trade.  We could do commons for commons or HOFers for HOFers.  Shoot me an email if you have any of the above for trade.  [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]

Adding some pictures to see if I can lure some E95s or E96s out of hiding :D

Couldn't get the pictures of my commons to load, but I have some of those as well.
